Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: I've \I've\contrac. Colloquial contraction of I have. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: -ive \-ive\suff. [L. -ivus.] An adjective suffix signifying relating or belonging to, of the nature of, tending to; as, affirmative, active, conclusive, corrective, diminutive. [1913 Webster]
